content.question: Dr. Jones hypothesizes that antianxiety drugs cause a reduction in central nervous system activity. In order to test the hypothesis, what should her independent variable be?

choices.label: Central versus peripheral nervous system activity
Taking Xanax versus taking a placebo
Patients with anxiety versus patients without anxiety

content.answer: Taking Xanax versus taking a placebo

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
